alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued March 08 at 9:51PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE BURNET POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR HELEN PIERCE, WHITE, FEMALE, 11 YEARS OLD, 4 FEET 10 INCHES TALL, 100 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR WITH BLONDE HIGHLIGHTS, BROWN EYES, AND LAST SEEN WEARING A WHITE SHIRT WITH BLUE JEAN SHORTS. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR AN UNKNOWN MALE IN CONNECTION WITH HER ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING AN UNKNOWN VEHICLE. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST HEARD FROM IN BURNET, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE BURNET POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 5 1 2 7 5 6 8 0 8 0. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS BURNET POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 8 3 0 7 3 0 0 1 8 3.
